entries.s_544: When you wish to help the Empire, come back and talk to me.
entries.s_540: Excellent.  Same situation as before then.  Pick up the defector west of Moenia. Take him to the Emperor's Retreat and talk to Lt. Allard Lissara.
entries.s_538: Certainly.  I am always willing to help.
entries.s_536: Welcome back.  I have another informant that could use an experienced escort .  Would you be willing to take him to Lt. Lissara?
entries.s_534: Good luck with your mission.  Remember, he's hiding west of Moenia.
entries.s_532: It's your loss.  Not everyone is given a chance to show his loyalty to the senior officers.  If you change your mind, come back and talk to me.  Maybe I will have something for you then.
entries.s_530: If it's all the same to you, I'd rather not get involved.
entries.s_528: Very good. I have a former rebel that wants the opportunity to make up for his rabble rousing.  The Emperor's retreat is fairly nearby and this guy needs an escort there.  When you get to the retreat, speak to Lt. Allard Lissara.
entries.s_526: I've always wanted an Imperial career.  I would be honored to help.
entries.s_524: Special enough that you will be gaining significant favor with the Imperial Military.
entries.s_520: Hello.  How would you like the opportunity to do something special for the Empire?
entries.s_518: Go away, scum.  I don't talk to your kind.
entries.s_516: If you are in the middle of something then get to it.  Talk to me when you have time.
entries.s_514: I don't have time right now.
entries.s_512: Excellent!  There's a Rebel defector hiding nearby.  I'll give you the location in your datapad.  Take him to the Emperor's Retreat to the West.  When you get there, talk to Lt. Allard Lissara.
entries.s_510: I am always interested in a good mission.
entries.s_508: If you are in the middle of something then get to it.  Talk to me when you have time.
entries.s_504: Good.  The defector is holed up in a safe place.  His former compatriots may have discovered that he is joining the right side.  I will give you coordinates to his location.  Escort him to the Emperor's Retreat and speak to Lt. Allard Lissara.  He will take it from there.
entries.s_502: I am honored to accept this assignment.
entries.s_500: Every so often, one of these rebel insurgents realizes that the Rebels are misguided.  In this case, this former rebel held some power in their poor excuse for a military.  His knowledge will help us crush the scum.
entries.s_496: Hello!  I have an important mission for you.
entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (c_rebdefector_jaek.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
